name: ChristmasSongsandAmbience
0:
”Alexa, open christmas songs”
”Alexa, start christmas songs”
”Alexa, launch christmas songs”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas songs
des:
Christmas Songs and Ambience is a huge collection of your favorite Christmas songs/carols. We will be adding the most popular and classical xmas songs available. Enjoy!

With this skill, you can either choose to play your favorite classical "Christmas Songs" or select from a wide range of "Christmas ambience" which can play as a background music ".

Below are the lists of Christmas Songs available for your listening pleasure in no particular order. More songs will be added regularly:

Jingle Bells
Joy to the world
O come all ye faithful
Away in a Manger
Silent Night
We wish you a Merry Christmas
O Holy Night
Deck the Halls
The First Noel
Twelve days
O Little Town of Bethlehem
Hark the Herald Angels sing
We Three Kings
Go tell it on the mountain
The Drummer Boy

Below are the lists of Christmas ambience available for your listening pleasure. More sounds will be added regularly:

Jingle Bells Country
Jingle Bells Piano
Joy to the world
O come all ye faithful
Away in a Manger
Silent Night
We wish you a Merry Christmas
O Holy Night
Deck the Halls
The First Noel
Twelve Days
Ave Maria
Auld Lang Syne
Hark the Herald Angels sing
Ding Dong Merrily
O Little Town of Bethlehem

To play each of the Christmas songs or ambience, just mention any of the listed songs or ambience. For example, if you want to listen to Joy to the world, just say "Joy to the world".

Merry Christmas Everyone!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
